## ng-app-base package

Module that contains a default configuration to run an [Angular](https://angular.io/) application against [Acoustic Content](https://www.ibm.com/products/watson-content-hub) in live and preview mode.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AcNgAppBaseModule](./ng-app-base.acngappbasemodule.md) | Imports the modules required for basic functionality |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [MODULE](./ng-app-base.module.md) | Module name |
|  [VERSION](./ng-app-base.version.md) | Version and build number of the package |
